release.action: Improved annotation support including types, fields and expressions (thanks to Jochen Kuhnle; QDOX-126).
Fix to lexer bug (thanks to Felix Meschberger but report QDOX-114 and Louis R. Marascio - fix + test).
Improved generic parsing support (thanks to Brian Slesinsky).
Improved annotation parsing support (thanks to Eric Redmond).
Improved anon inner class parsing support (thanks to Eric Redmond).
Maven2 support (original contribution by Eric Redmond).

Implemented QDOX-83: Original body of method can be obtained using JavaMethod.getSourceCode(). Original field initialization expression can be obtained by JavaField.getInitializationExpression(). (Much of the work done by Shawn Chain).
Improved Enum parsing support (thanks to Brian Slesinsky and James Lee).
Switched license from 'Ironsmith' Apache license clone to genuine Apache 2 license.
Implemented QDOX-52: Provide line numbers for all java entities.
Implemented QDOX-59: Ensure that things (e.g. named tag-parameters, bean-properties) are consistently returned in declared order.
Implemented QDOX-66: Support for wildcard generic-type arguments.
Implemented QDOX-67: Convenience methods - Type.isPrimitive() and Type.isVoid().
Parser can now handle Java 5 annotations.
Implemented QDOX-68: Support for generic-type parameters on methods.
Implemented QDOX-70: Support for Java 5 varargs syntax: "printf(Object... stuff)". New method, JavaParameter.isVarArgs().
Implemented QDOX-78: JavaDoc comments now preserve end of line characters.
Fix QDOX-61: Support legal Unicode characters in identifiers.
Fix QDOX-63: Inner/nested classes are now resolved correctly between packages (Fix by Philippe Gaudin).
Fix QDOX-72: Correct terminology re "inner" vs "nested" classes.
Fix QDOX-73: Reinstate public constructors on concrete model classes.
Fix QDOX-75: Support for methods that specify array dimensions at end: String doStuff()[]
Fix QDOX-80: Static blocks do not add static modifier to next method.
Support for trailing semicolon after class definition.
Bugfix: Support for empty /**/ comments.

Patch from Mario Siegenthaler and Daniel MÃ¼ller to improve tolerance of Java 5 syntax, including: annotations with classes as parameters, generic field initialization, static imports and enums with enumeration ending with a semicolon. Fixes QDOX-77.
Added QDoxTester to test that QDox can successfully parse a load of Java source.
Implement QDOX-47: Refactor DocletTag handling so that all context information is provided via the DocletTagFactory.
Implement QDOX-53: Add support for parsing of JSR-14 generic types.
Fix QDOX-45, QDOX-50: Improve parsing of tag parameters, particularly where whitespace is involved.
Fix QDOX-49: Fixed generation of Eclipse ".classpath".
Fix QDOX-57: Problems compiling against jmock-1.0.0.
Fixed QDOX-27: Handle extra stars in Javadoc start/end tokens.
Fixed QDOX-28: Handle unclosed quotes in tag values.
Fixed QDOX-30: Support for strictfp modifier (and volatile and native).
Fixed QDOX-33: JavaClass.getTagsByName() is buggy.
Fixed QDOX-34: recursive retrieval of tags from superclasses got a bug.
Fixed QDOX-29, QDOX-37: Handle inner-classes in type-resolution.
Implemented QDOX-39: Support multiple fields in a single field-declaration.
Throw a ParseException, including location info, if a syntax error is encountered.
Fixed QDOX-42: Fix handling of MAC line-endings.
Fixed QDOX-43: Allow "$" in identifiers.
Implemented QDOX-44: Added DocletTag.getNamedParameterMap().
Implemented QDOX-46: Added JavaField.getDeclarationSignature().
Implemented QDOX-3. Support for binary classes.
Implemented QDOX-6. Support for bean properties.
Implemented QDOX-7. New isA(String fullyQualifiedName) method in JavaClass.

Implemented QDOX-12. Pluggable DocletTag implementations via DocletTagFactory. This opens up for tag validation, ${property} substitution and other goodies that shouldn't go directly into QDox' core, but rather into pluggable extensions.
Fixed QDOX-13. Line numbers in the lexer.
Fixed QDOX-14. resolveTypeInternal doesn't work for nested types.
Fixed QDOX-17. JavaMethod.equals() failed for constructors.
Implemented QDOX-18. BeanProperty : support for type retrieval.
Fixed QDOX-16, QDOX-19. More robust handling of "*" and "@" in Javadoc body.
Applied QDOX-24. Encoding support for internationalization.
Type now has a getJavaClass() method making it easier to find the JavaClass of a Type from e.g. Velocity. Example: $method.returns.javaClass
Implemented tag inheritance on classes and methods. (It makes no sense to have it on fields or constructors). Accessed with clazz|method.getTag[s]ByName(String name, boolean superclasses).
DocletTag is an interface.
Added a getClasses() method to JavaDocBuilder that will return all JavaClasses.
Added a getDerivedClasses() method to JavaClass that will return all derived classes, i.e. subclasses or subinterfaces.
Added getDeclarationSignature() and getCallSignature() methods to JavaMethod.
Added a getNamedParameter(String tagName, String parameterName) convenience method to AbstractJavaEntity for easier retrieval of tag parameters without having to null-check the tag.
Added APITestCase. This is a JUnit extension that can be used to compare the equality of two Java sources on the API level.
Added int getLineNumber() to DocletTag.
Added JavaSource getJavaSource() to DocletTag.
Added boolean isInner() to JavaClass.
Added JavaMethod[] getMethods(boolean superclasses) to JavaClass.
Quoted tokens allowed in doclet tags.
Asterix symbol allowed in doclet tags.
Added support for inner classes.
Moved build system over to Maven.
Initial release.
